testcase.name: test_gateway_tldr_grep_includes_linkified_pipeline_example
testcase.failure:
self = app_with_gateway = def test_gateway_tldr_grep_includes_linkified_pipeline_example(self, app_with_gateway): """Test that /gateway/tldr/grep includes the stdin pipeline example and linkifies commands.""" with app_with_gateway.test_client() as client: response = client.get("/gateway/tldr/grep", follow_redirects=True) assert response.status_code == 200 data = response.get_data(as_text=True) assert " assert "/gateway/tldr/cat" in data, ( f"Expected 'cat' to be linkified in grep page: {data[:500]}" ) E AssertionError: Expected 'cat' to be linkified in grep page: E E E E tldr grep - Error E E E E
\n\n\n \n tldr grep - Error\n
